instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 - Backlight issues
threads.message:
i have a 820-3115 with backlight issues, i have never not been able to repair a macbook with backlight before, :(

Replaced LCD Connector, backlight filter, and backlight fuse, 

seems like Q9706 wont open
Q9706 pin 4 12.6V, pin 3 12.2 V

LCD_BKLT_EN - 0V

BKLT_PLT_RST_L - 3.30V

any help

threads.title: 820-3115 - Backlight issues
threads.message:
Did you check for image even?
Confirm first if you have USB activity, or chime at least.

threads.title: 820-3115 - Backlight issues
threads.message: Ok diode mode on backlight output? What voltage do you get on backlight currently 0?
